Name: CRAKEN
About the game: Unlock the captain of the pirate ship, take the helm more tightly and lead to the Craken! And we are behind the trunk. He destroyed 4 houses in one fell swoop, villagers said. At that moment they realized that we needed more guns, and there were just a couple of them on board . Your main task is the treasures of Craken. Dead or Alive - you must return them! Find and return what is rightfully yours, but remember, you are alone and do not wait for help! Just a deep study of the plot, attention to detail and low poly realism, help you dive into childhood, piracy and adventure. Getting the treasure is just as hard as surviving by challenging Craken! So do not forget to clean the musket, the misfire may be the last. Features: - Convenient control of the ship! - Setting the camera on the level! - Sea Battles against Craken for life or death! - Unique game mechanics! - Bright and funny multiplayer - Hunting for treasures in an open and dangerous ocean! - An interesting and heroic story about pirates. - Great game for the party!
